name: Save ME! Myself Edition
description:
The grave digger has fallen in a pit! Help him survive as long as possible with the aid of his arm, sword, wand and potions.

Move with W A S D, aim with your mouse and select the weapon to use with 1, 2, 3 or 4.

The arm allows you to pick coins and potions, the sword impales your enemy fast but you are vulnerable, the wand shoots magic but is weak and slow, and the potion recovers 30 HP.

Killing a ghost awards 10 score, picking a coin 5.

This game is for the Miz Jam 1

This is my very first game for a game jam, if you like it post your score and time survived.

Made with Construct 2 and  the sounds where taken from the personal edition asset kit.

Good Luck dealing with those ghosts!
